lyric:
[by:fakeBaozhu]
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Tim Bergling/Egbert Nathaniel Dawkins III/Michael Aaron Einziger
[00:01.000] 作词 : Tim Bergling/Egbert Nathaniel Dawkins III/Michael Aaron Einziger
[00:07.929]Feeling my way through the darkness
[00:11.925]Guided by a beating heart
[00:15.609]I can't tell where the journey will end
[00:19.710]But I know where it starts
[00:23.471]They tell me I'm too young to understand
[00:27.285]They say I'm caught up in a dream
[00:31.073]Well life will pass me by if I don't open up my eyes
[00:35.436]Well that's fine by me
[00:37.630]So wake me up when it's all over
[00:41.731]When I'm wiser and I'm older
[00:45.728]All this time I was finding myself
[00:49.280]And I didn't know I was lost
[00:53.303]So wake me up when it's all over
[00:57.326]When I'm wiser and I'm older
[01:01.244]All this time I was finding myself
[01:04.693]And I didn't know I was lost
[01:56.441]I tried carrying the weight of the world
[02:00.229]But I only have two hands
[02:04.278]I hope I get the chance to travel the world
[02:07.987]And I don't have any plans
[02:12.036]I wish that I could stay forever this young
[02:15.563]Not afraid to close my eyes
[02:19.507]Life's a game made for everyone
[02:23.713]And love is a prize
[02:26.038]So wake me up when it's all over
[02:30.218]When I'm wiser and I'm older
[02:34.084]All this time I was finding myself
[02:37.506]And I didn't know I was lost
[02:41.685]So wake me up when it's all over
[02:45.630]When I'm wiser and I'm older
[02:49.444]All this time I was finding myself
[02:53.075]And I didn't know I was lost
[02:58.482]I didn't know I was lost
[03:02.087]I didn't know I was lost
[03:05.927]I didn't know I was lost
[03:10.080]I didn't know I was lost
tlyric:
[by:相拥三份可乐炸鸡释放满怀热情]
[00:07.929]穿越黑暗，寻找我的方向
[00:11.925]凭一颗跳动的心的指引
[00:15.609]我不关心这场旅行会在哪里结束
[00:19.710]但我知道它从哪里开始
[00:23.471]他们说我年少无知
[00:27.285]他们说我活在梦里
[00:31.073]如果我还不睁开眼，时间就会从我手中流走
[00:35.436]但我觉得还不错哦
[00:37.630]当一切都结束的时候再叫醒我吧
[00:41.731]当我更睿智，更年迈的时候
[00:45.728]我曾经一直在寻找我自己
[00:49.280]而我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
[00:53.303]当一切都结束的时候再叫醒我吧
[00:57.326]当我更睿智，更年迈的时候
[01:01.244]我曾经一直在寻找我自己
[01:04.693]而我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
[01:56.441]我曾以天下为己任
[02:00.229]但我孤身一人
[02:04.278]我希望有机会周游世界
[02:07.987]但我也没什么计划
[02:12.036]但愿我能一直这么年轻就好了
[02:15.563]不用害怕闭上眼睛
[02:19.507]人生就是一场游戏
[02:23.713]而爱就是奖励
[02:26.038]当一切都结束的时候再叫醒我吧
[02:30.218]当我更睿智，更年迈的时候
[02:34.084]我曾经一直在寻找我自己
[02:37.506]而我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
[02:41.685]当一切都结束的时候再叫醒我吧
[02:45.630]当我更睿智，更年迈的时候
[02:49.444]我曾经一直在寻找我自己
[02:53.075]而我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
[02:58.482]我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
[03:02.087]我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
[03:05.927]我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
[03:10.080]我竟在不知不觉中迷失了自我
